类 HallTalk

  • java.lang.Object
    • Talk
      • HallTalk
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class HallTalk
extends Talk
    class: communicate with Hall Server.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从类继承的嵌套类/接口 Talk

        Talk.TalkTask

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private net.sf.json.JSONObject connection
      variable: create a JSONObject connection.
      private static int ERR_COUNT_LIMIT
      variable: define upper limit.

      • 从类继承的字段 Talk

        clientConnection, hallServerConnection, is, os, runFlag, socket, thread, timer

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      HallTalk() 

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void run()
      function: receive user data from Hall Server.
      protected void stop()
      function: disconnect the Hall Server.
      (专用程序包) void task()
      function: send user data to Hall Server.

      • 从类继承的方法 Talk

        add, start

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
